content.text: Match ends, Manchester City 1, FC Bayern München 2.
Second Half ends, Manchester City 1, FC Bayern München 2.
Substitution, FC Bayern München. Mitchell Weiser replaces Philipp Lahm because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Delay in match Philipp Lahm (FC Bayern München) because of an injury.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Mario Mandzukic.
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Manuel Neuer.
Attempt saved. Edin Dzeko (Manchester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by James Milner.
Corner,  FC Bayern München. Conceded by James Milner.
Foul by Vincent Kompany (Manchester City).
Philipp Lahm (FC Bayern München) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Jan Kirchhoff (FC Bayern München) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Yaya Touré (Manchester City).
Mario Mandzukic (FC Bayern München) hits the right post with a right footed shot from the centre of the box. Assisted by Thomas Müller.
Corner,  FC Bayern München. Conceded by Gaël Clichy.
Attempt blocked. Thomas Müller (FC Bayern München) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked.
Offside, Manchester City. Vincent Kompany tries a through ball, but Edin Dzeko is caught offside.
Offside, FC Bayern München. Mario Mandzukic tries a through ball, but Franck Ribéry is caught offside.
Offside, Manchester City. Gaël Clichy tries a through ball, but Edin Dzeko is caught offside.
Foul by Rafinha (FC Bayern München).
Samir Nasri (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

Daniel Van Buyten (FC Bayern München) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dedryck Boyata (Manchester City).
Corner,  Manchester City. Conceded by Mario Mandzukic.
Substitution, Manchester City. Edin Dzeko replaces Álvaro Negredo.
Goal!  Manchester City 1, FC Bayern München 2. Mario Mandzukic (FC Bayern München) header from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Thomas Müller with a cross.
Corner,  FC Bayern München. Conceded by Vincent Kompany.
James Milner (Manchester City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Rafinha (FC Bayern München).
Manuel Neuer (FC Bayern München) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jesús Navas (Manchester City).
Attempt blocked. Samir Nasri (Manchester City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Pablo Zabaleta.
Attempt missed. Xherdan Shaqiri (FC Bayern München) left footed shot from outside the box is just a bit too high. Assisted by Thomas Müller.
Substitution, FC Bayern München. Jérôme Boateng replaces Dante.
Substitution, FC Bayern München. Daniel Van Buyten replaces Javi Martínez.
Goal!  Manchester City 1, FC Bayern München 1. Thomas Müller (FC Bayern München) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom right corner.
Penalty conceded by Pablo Zabaleta (Manchester City) with a hand ball in the penalty area.
Attempt saved. Jan Kirchhoff (FC Bayern München) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
Substitution, FC Bayern München. Jan Kirchhoff replaces Bastian Schweinsteiger.

Goal!  Manchester City 1, FC Bayern München 0. Álvaro Negredo (Manchester City) right footed shot from the right side of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Samir Nasri with a through ball.
Franck Ribéry (FC Bayern München) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Yaya Touré (Manchester City).
Attempt saved. Jesús Navas (Manchester City) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Samir Nasri.
Substitution, FC Bayern München. Rafinha replaces Toni Kroos because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.

Substitution, FC Bayern München. Mario Mandzukic replaces Arjen Robben.
Offside, Manchester City. Samir Nasri tries a through ball, but Álvaro Negredo is caught offside.

Offside, Manchester City. Jesús Navas tries a through ball, but Samir Nasri is caught offside.
